name: tm64
effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The power of this attack move is doubled if the user
has been hurt by the target in the same turn.
